scripts.build:dev: echo-cli 'Building DEV ...' && npm run webpack:dev && echo-cli 'Build Complete ✔'
scripts.build:dist: echo-cli 'Building DIST ...' && npm run webpack:dist && echo-cli 'Build Complete ✔'
scripts.cordova:build:dev: echo-cli 'Building DEV ...' && npm run cordova:webpack:dev && echo-cli 'Build Complete ✔'
scripts.cordova:build:dist: echo-cli 'Building DEV ...' && npm run cordova:webpack:dist && echo-cli 'Build Complete ✔'
scripts.cordova:android:add: cd cordova && cordova platform add android
scripts.cordova:android:remove: cd cordova && cordova platform rm android
scripts.cordova:android:build:dev: npm run cordova:dev && cd cordova && cordova build android
scripts.cordova:android:build:release: npm run cordova:dev && cd cordova && cordova build android --release
scripts.cordova:android:run: npm run cordova:dev && cd cordova && cordova run android
scripts.cordova:browser:add: cd cordova && cordova platform add browser
scripts.cordova:browser:remove: cd cordova && cordova platform rm browser
scripts.cordova:browser:build:dev: npm run cordova:dev && cd cordova && cordova build browser
scripts.cordova:browser:build:release: npm run cordova:dev && cd cordova && cordova build browser --release
scripts.cordova:browser:run: npm run cordova:dev && cd cordova && cordova run browser
